comment: Pretty much the best non-Islay in my cabinet.

Nice light fruity nose, mid palate has lots of flavor but the finish ends too bitter and harsh for my liking.  Also there is a pretty strong astringency to this malt, I’m usually not sensitive to this proof but you can definitely feel it here.  Maybe needs more time in the bottle?

Nose: Apple sauce, bananas
Palate: Brine, pepper, caramelised red apples that turn into apple cider
Finish: Oak spice, cinnamon, some smoke lingering
